backend/main.mo: Main Motoko actor for the CertiPrep AI backend, managing certifications, domains, objectives, questions, flashcards, test results, PDF reading progress, and user profiles with access control and approval mixins.
feature_evidence.json: Empty feature evidence report JSON file with no recorded features.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: JSON document summarizing each frontend source file's purpose, covering pages like QAPractice, Flashcards, PracticeTest, StudyMaterials, Dashboard, and components like PDFViewer, along with hooks and config files.
frontend/index.css: Global Tailwind CSS entry point defining OKLCH-based CSS custom properties for light and dark themes covering background, foreground, primary, secondary, sidebar, and chart colors.
frontend/index.html: HTML entry point for the CertiPrep AI React app, mounting the root div and loading the main TypeScript module.
frontend/public/study-materials/comptia-: Static HTML study guide for CompTIA A+ (Core 1 & Core 2 exams) with styled sections covering domains, tables, exam tips, memory aids, and a port number reference.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Root React component that sets up TanStack Router with routes for Dashboard, CertificationSelector, StudyMode, QAPractice, Flashcards, PracticeTest, and StudyMaterials, all wrapped in a shared Layout.
frontend/src/components/FlashcardDeck.ts: Reusable flashcard component with flip animation, displaying front/back content and correct/incorrect action buttons that appear after the card is revealed.
frontend/src/components/Layout.tsx: App shell component providing a sticky header with logo, desktop and mobile navigation links, and an 'AI Ready' status indicator wrapping all page content.
frontend/src/components/PDFViewer.tsx: A modal PDF/HTML viewer component that tracks and persists reading scroll progress per certification using debounced backend saves, and restores the user's last scroll position on open.
frontend/src/components/VoiceControls.ts: A UI panel component that exposes text-to-speech and speech-to-text controls, including voice selection, rate/pitch sliders, a mic toggle, and a live interim transcript display.
frontend/src/data/certifications.ts: Defines TypeScript interfaces and a static data array describing CompTIA certifications with their exam domains, objectives, key terms, ports, protocols, and study notes.
frontend/src/data/studyMaterials.ts: Defines interfaces and a static list mapping each CompTIA certification to its associated study material files (HTML guides), including metadata like color, description, and file paths.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: A React hook that creates and caches an ICP backend actor (authenticated or anonymous) based on the current Internet Identity, and invalidates dependent queries whenever the actor changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides an Internet Identity authentication context and provider for React, managing AuthClient creation, login/logout flows, identity persistence, and delegation validity checks.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Provides React Query hooks for CRUD operations on flashcards, questions, test results, and reading progress, all backed by an ICP actor.
Custom hook wrapping the Web Speech API to provide start/stop voice recognition with interim and final transcript state.
frontend/src/hooks/useSpeechSynthesis.ts: Custom hook for text-to-speech using the SpeechSynthesis API, with voice ranking/selection, rate/pitch controls, and markdown stripping.
frontend/src/index.css: Global stylesheet importing Google Fonts and Tailwind, defining CSS custom properties for dark/light themes, and utility component styles for badges and study guide HTML content.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Application entry point that mounts the React app with QueryClientProvider and InternetIdentityProvider wrapping the root App component.
frontend/src/pages/CertificationSelector: Page component that displays a grid of certification cards with exam details, domain previews, and navigation links to study, flashcard, and test routes.
frontend/src/pages/Dashboard.tsx: Dashboard page showing all certifications as cards with the latest test score progress bar and quick-action links to Study, Flashcards, and Test pages.
frontend/src/pages/Flashcards.tsx: Flashcard study page for a given certification that supports generating new cards, loading saved cards, and tracking correct/incorrect results across setup, study, and review phases.
frontend/src/pages/PracticeTest.tsx: Timed practice test page that generates multiple-choice questions for a certification, tracks answers with a countdown timer, submits results to the backend, and displays a scored review.
frontend/src/pages/QAPractice.tsx: Interactive Q&A practice page that lets users filter questions by domain, answer one at a time with immediate feedback, and review pass/fail results at the end.
frontend/src/pages/StudyMaterials.tsx: Study materials listing page that displays certification cards with reading progress and opens an in-page PDF viewer for individual study documents.
frontend/src/pages/StudyMode.tsx: AI-style instructor chat page for a certification domain that generates contextual text responses to student questions and supports voice input/output controls.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Utility functions for reading URL parameters from both query strings and hash-based routing, with helpers to persist, retrieve, and clear those values via sessionStorage and history.replaceState.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind CSS configuration for the frontend, defining dark mode, custom color palettes (navy, amber, electric, semantic tokens via oklch CSS variables), typography, border radius, and plugin imports.
project_state.json: Project state tracking file for CertiPrep AI listing known UI issues, pending feature/fix requests (card borders, sun/moon toggle, uniform card sizes, security audits, GUI consistency), and architectural notes.
